body:
====================
django-autotranslate
====================

A simple Django app to automatically translate the pot (`.po`) files generated by django's makemessages command
using google translate.

[![pypi version](https://pypip.in/v/django-autotranslate/badge.png)][1]
[![pypi downloads/day](https://pypip.in/d/django-autotranslate/badge.png?period=day)][1]
[![pypi downloads/week](https://pypip.in/d/django-autotranslate/badge.png?period=week)][1]
[![pypi downloads/month](https://pypip.in/d/django-autotranslate/badge.png?period=month)][1]

Installation:
-------------

    $  pip install django-autotranslate

Quickstart:
-----------

    **Assumption:** you already have run `makemessages` command and `.po` files have been generated.

 - Add 'autotranslate' to **INSTALLED_APPS** setting.
 - run the following command to see the magic happen (fingers crossed):

        $  python manage.py translate_messages


[1]: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-autotranslate/
